biotools.summary: GLASS (GLobal Alignment SyStem) is a tool for aligning pairs of homologous sequences. It is designed for aligning long, divergent sequences, that contain blocks of moderate to strong homology, such as orthologous/paralogous pairs of genes

bioschemas.name: GLASS
bioschemas.summary: GLASS (GLobal Alignment SyStem) is a tool for aligning pairs of homologous sequences. It is designed for aligning long, divergent sequences, that contain blocks of moderate to strong homology, such as orthologous/paralogous pairs of genes
